# Unwavering Resolve
## Scripture
"Hebrews 10:36 - For you have need of endurance, so that when you have done the will of God you may receive what is promised." â€“ Hebrews 10:36

## Reflection
As men, we face numerous challenges and obstacles in life. We are often faced with decisions that require unwavering resolve and commitment to our faith. Today's verse encourages us to persevere, to hold fast to our convictions, and to trust in God's promises. It reminds us that the reward for our endurance is not a fleeting pleasure, but a deep and lasting relationship with Him.

In a world that constantly tries to sway us from our purpose, we must cultivate the strength to stand firm. We must be men of resolve, men who are willing to take a stand for what we believe in, even when it's hard. We must be men who trust in God's goodness, despite the uncertainty of the world around us.

As we face the challenges of the day, let us remember that our resolve is not our own, but is rooted in the strength of Christ. Let us stand tall, unwavering in our commitment to Him, and trust that He will see us through.

## Daily Challenge
"Do 20 squats while declaring your trust in God's promises."
